title: Exceptional Government Effectiveness
description: In 2023, Switzerland achieved the highest possible score in government effectiveness, ranking at the 100th percentile globally.

title: Leading in Chemical Manufacturing
description: As of 2021, chemicals accounted for 29.15% of Switzerland's manufacturing value added, highlighting its strong industrial sector.

title: High Out-of-Pocket Health Expenditure
description: In 2022, Swiss citizens spent an average of $2,366 per capita on out-of-pocket health expenses, one of the highest globally.

title: Significant Private Health Spending
description: In 2022, Switzerland's domestic private health expenditure per capita was $7,131, reflecting a robust private healthcare sector.

title: Negative Reserves and Related Items
description: Switzerland reported a negative balance of $132 billion in reserves and related items in 2023, indicating potential economic challenges.
